\section{SunEditor Demo}
\href{http://suneditor.com/}{SunEditor} is a pure JavaScript based WYSIWYG web editor, with no dependencies.\par
\subsection{Formatting Options}
SunEditor provides comprehensive text formatting options:\par
\begin{itemize}
  \item \textbf{Bold} for emphasis

  \item \textit{Italics} for titles and foreign words

  \item \underline{Underline} for important text

  \item \sout{Strikethrough} for deleted content

  \item \colorbox{yellow}{Highlighted text} for attention
\end{itemize}
\subsection{Mathematical Content}
The editor handles superscripts and subscripts well:\par
\begin{itemize}
  \item Einstein's famous equation: E = mc\textsuperscript{2}

  \item Water molecule: H\textsubscript{2}O

  \item Quadratic formula uses x\textsuperscript{2}
\end{itemize}
\subsection{Block Elements}
\begin{quote}
  "The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now."\par
\end{quote}
\subsubsection{Code Blocks}
\begin{verbatim}function greet(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}\end{verbatim}
\subsection{Tables}
\begin{tabular}{lll}
  \textbf{Editor} & \textbf{Size}  & \textbf{Dependencies} \\
  SunEditor       & {\small 50KB}  & None                  \\
  CKEditor        & {\small 300KB} & None                  \\
  TinyMCE         & {\small 400KB} & None                  \\
\end{tabular}Visit the \href{https://github.com/nicejob/suneditor}{GitHub page} for more information.\par
